name: zerotier
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing zerotier cloud resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`zerotier` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/terraform-providers/terraform-provider-zerotier).

zerotierCentralToken.description: ZeroTier Central API Token; you can generate a new one at https://my.zerotier.com/account.

zerotierCentralUrl.description: ZeroTier Central API endpoint. Unlikely you'll need to alter this unless you're testing ZeroTier central itself.

provider.description:
The provider type for the zerotier package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

zerotierCentralToken.description: ZeroTier Central API Token; you can generate a new one at https://my.zerotier.com/account.

zerotierCentralUrl.description: ZeroTier Central API endpoint. Unlikely you'll need to alter this unless you're testing ZeroTier central itself.

zerotierCentralToken.description: ZeroTier Central API Token; you can generate a new one at https://my.zerotier.com/account.

zerotierCentralUrl.description: ZeroTier Central API endpoint. Unlikely you'll need to alter this unless you're testing ZeroTier central itself.
